lines.text: "Hitler is a stinker." That's no military secret!

[jumping out of refrigerator]
Well! Whata ya know? The little light. She stays on!
I'll do the job. I'm a woman-hater. She won't get to first base, this Hatta Mari tomater.
They lose more darn Nazis that way.
I regret that I have but one secret to swallow for my country.
